TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit HyperLinkDataBindingHandler extends System.Web.UI.Design.DataBindingHandler

summary.span: 提供超連結屬性的資料繫結處理常式。

span.span: Provides a data-binding handler for a hyperlink property.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立名為類別`CustomHyperLinkDataBindingHandler`，其衍生自`HyperLinkDataBindingHandler`類別。The following code example creates a class, named `CustomHyperLinkDataBindingHandler`, which derives from the `HyperLinkDataBindingHandler` class. 它會解析的設計階段資料繫結`CustomHyperLink`類別使用方法。It resolves design-time data binding for the `CustomHyperLink` class using the method. [!code-csharp[HyperLinkDesigner_Resubmit#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HyperLinkDesigner_Resubmit/CS/CustomHyperLinkDesigner.cs#2)] [!code-vb[HyperLinkDesigner_Resubmit#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HyperLinkDesigner_Resubmit/VB/customhyperlinkdesigner.vb#2)]

summary.span: 初始化 類別的執行個體。

span.span: Initializes an instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public override void DataBindControl (System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost designerHost, System.Web.UI.Control control);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance void DataBindControl(class System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost designerHost, class System.Web.UI.Control control) cil managed
public: override void DataBindControl(System::ComponentModel::Design::IDesignerHost ^ designerHost, System::Web::UI::Control ^ control);

span.span: The for the document that contains the control.

summary.span: 為指定控制項解析設計階段的資料繫結。

span.span: Resolves design-time data-binding for the specified control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會判斷是否和屬性是資料繫結的控制項。This method determines whether the and properties of the control are data-bound. 如果屬性是資料繫結，這個方法會設定 「 資料繫結 」 到屬性的值。If the property is data-bound, this method sets the value of the property to "DataBound". 如果屬性是資料繫結，這個方法會設定為字串屬性的值，控制項必須使用超連結外觀。If the property is data-bound, this method sets the value of the property to a text string so the control will have the appearance of a working hyperlink. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立名為類別`CustomHyperLinkDataBindingHandler`，其衍生自`HyperLinkDataBindingHandler`類別。The following code example creates a class, named `CustomHyperLinkDataBindingHandler`, which derives from the `HyperLinkDataBindingHandler` class. 它會解析的設計階段資料繫結屬性`CustomHyperLink`類別，因此當它是資料繫結在設計階段，預留位置文字會顯示屬性。It resolves design-time data binding for the property of the `CustomHyperLink` class so that placeholder text is displayed for the property when it is data-bound at design time. [!code-csharp[HyperLinkDesigner_Resubmit#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HyperLinkDesigner_Resubmit/CS/CustomHyperLinkDesigner.cs#2)] [!code-vb[HyperLinkDesigner_Resubmit#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HyperLinkDesigner_Resubmit/VB/customhyperlinkdesigner.vb#2)]
